column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " With this technique the dragons showed us , Zuko and I will be unstoppable . "
#Text=Sokka says : " Yeah , that 's a great dance you two learned there . "
#Text=Zuko says : " It 's not a dance .
#Text=" Zuko says : " It 's a sacred form that happens to be thousands of years old !
#Text=" Katara says : " Oh , yeah ?
#Text=What 's your little form called ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " The Dancing Dragon .

#Text=" Main Aang Zuko Antagonists Ham Ghao says : " Minor Appa The Duke Haru Katara Sokka Teo Toph Ran and Shaw Sun Warriors Sun Warrior chief " Katara says : " Um , are n't you forgetting the tarp ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Right , got it ... " Katara says : " Sokka , you 're supposed to put the tarp on top of the tent .
#Text=You know , so we do n't get rained on ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Ordinarily , you 'd be right , but seeing how it 's the dry season , you 're not .
#Text=Besides that tarp makes a pretty warm blanket .
#Text=" Katara says : " But what if it does rain ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " What if it does n't ?
#Text=Then I would have put up the tarp for nothing .
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're infuriating !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Katara , why do n't you worry about gathering firewood , because that kindling is looking pretty sorry .

#Text=" Katara says : " Well , if you do n't like my firewood - " Sokka says : " Fine by me , if you 're not gon na do your job - " Aang says : " Okay , I got the grub if you guys got the - hey , where 's the campfire ?
#Text=And what happened to the tent ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Why do n't you ask Miss Know - It - All , Queen of the Twigs .
#Text=" Katara says : " Oh yeah ?
#Text=Well , you 're Mister Lazy Bum , King of the Tents !
#Text=" Aang says : " Okay , listen guys , harsh words wo n't solve problems , action will .
#Text=Why do n't you just switch jobs ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Sounds good .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Whatever .
#Text=" Aang says : " You see that ?
#Text=Settling feuds and making peace , all in a day 's work for the Avatar .
#Text=Come on , Momo , that 's fair .
#Text=Appa 's got five stomachs .
#Text="
